name: Lisa
desc: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius, deemed by Sumeru Academia to be their most distinguished graduate in the past two centuries.

elemSkill.name: Violet Arc
elemSkill.desc: #Channels the power of lightning to sweep bothersome matters away. {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tap}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} Releases a homing Lightning Orb. On hit, it deals Electro DMG, and applies a stack of the Conductive status (Max 3 stacks) to opponents in a small AoE. Hold After an extended casting time, calls down lightning from the heavens, dealing massive Electro DMG to all nearby opponents. Deals great amounts of extra damage to opponents based on the number of Conductive stacks applied to them, and clears their Conductive status. Electro Purple is the raiment of the Witch of Purple Rose.

elemBurst.name: Lightning Rose
elemBurst.desc: Summons a Lightning Rose that unleashes powerful lightning bolts, launching surrounding opponents and dealing Electro DMG. The Lightning Rose will continuously emit lightning to knock back opponents and deal Electro DMG throughout the ability's duration. This rose is beautiful, but beware its mortal thorns.

attackSkill.name: Normal Attack: Lightning Touch
attackSkill.desc:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 4 lightning attacks that deal <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal <color=#FFACFFFF>AoE Electro DMG</color> after a short casting time.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Gathering the might of Electro, Lisa plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals <color=#FFACFFFF>AoE Electro DMG</color> upon impact with the ground.

c13ns.name: Infinite Circuit
c13ns.desc: Lisa regenerates 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding <color=#FFD780FF>Violet Arc</color>.\nA maximum of 10 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

c13ns.name: Electromagnetic Field
c13ns.desc: Holding <color=#FFD780FF>Violet Arc</color> has the following effects:\n·Increases DEF by 25%.\n·Increases Lisa's resistance to interruption.

c13ns.name: Resonant Thunder
c13ns.desc: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Lightning Rose</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

c13ns.name: Plasma Eruption
c13ns.desc: Increases the number of lightning bolts released by <color=#FFD780FF>Lightning Rose</color> by 1-3.

c13ns.name: Electrocute
c13ns.desc: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Violet Arc</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

c13ns.name: Pulsating Witch
c13ns.desc: When Lisa takes the field, she applies 3 stacks of <color=#FFD780FF>Violet Arc</color>'s Conductive status onto nearby opponents.\nThis effect can only occur once every 5s.
